definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
as the saying goes/as they say...

sentences.english: Like they say, barking dogs don't bite.
sentences.chinese: 常言說的好，會叫的狗不咬人。

sentences.english: Sometimes, crammer said on 100 times to be become " the truth ".
sentences.chinese: 有時，謊言說上一百遍就成了“真理”。

sentences.english: There was talk of Patrick going to Arsenal over the summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏季有傳言說帕特里克會去阿森納。

sentences.english: The speech style of emic research and the question of ethnic consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 主位研究的言說方式和民族認同。

sentences.english: In transformational language, flipping the switch “causes” the light to turn on.
sentences.chinese: 用轉換的語言說，扳動開關“造成”了燈亮。

sentences.english: They exist in time wholly of themselves, with an unspeakable solemnity.
sentences.chinese: 他們在時間中自我存在，有着不可言說的莊嚴。

sentences.english: An indescribable sorrow filled his heart and he automatically turned his head round.
sentences.chinese: 心頭悵仍到不可言說，只是無意識地把身子亂轉。

sentences.english: Lacan Shit is the languaged Other.
Rumor has it you were the one who outsmarted the artificial intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 有傳言說你是唯一一個比人工智能更聰明的人。

sentences.english: Rumors amassed that portions of her brain had been subpoenaed for the analysis.
sentences.chinese: 有流言說他這個姐妹的部分腦組織被傳訊拿來做分析。

sentences.english: But there are already murmurs that it's much worse than that.
sentences.chinese: 但已有許多謠言說那是比扭傷更嚴重多了。

sentences.english: Self-existence is one of the special features of modernistic art.
sentences.chinese: 自我言說其存在，是現代主義藝術的特質之一。

sentences.english: There have been rumours that Dylan was involved with heroin.
sentences.chinese: 以前就有傳言說迪倫曾經吸食過海洛因。

sentences.english: People often say that, compared with nature, man is insignificant.
sentences.chinese: 常言說，和自然界相比，人類十分渺小。

sentences.english: However, efforts are made to the calling that the vitality of language.
sentences.chinese: 然而，卻努力於招喚語言言說的生機。

sentences.english: Therefore, the emergence of artistic signification is no longer unconceivable.
sentences.chinese: 由此，藝術意味的生成不再是一個不可言說的問題。

definition: thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
to remove/to step back from involvement/to disengage
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
